alert.note: Alert for King William; King and Queen (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 6:51PM EDT until September 07 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN KING AND QUEEN AND NORTHWESTERN KING WILLIAM COUNTIES... At 651 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Beulahville, or near Saint Stephens Church, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Beulahville around 655 PM EDT. Newtown around 700 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Enfield, Owenton, Globe, Pollards Corner, Turpin, Upshaw, Etna Mills, Duane Fork, and Epworth. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
